formulas.name: Subject
formulas.expression: {!StoreresellermemoFieldValue} +" - " + If(isblank({!Store_Email_protection_Product_Code}), null, {!Store_Email_protection_Product_Code}) +" " + if(isblank({!Store_Endpoint_Protection_Product_Code}), null, {!Store_Endpoint_Protection_Product_Code}) +" " + if(isblank({!Store_Log_Monitoring_Product_Code}), null, {!Store_Log_Monitoring_Product_Code}) +" " + if(isblank({!Store_Network_Monitoring_Product_Code}), null, {!Store_Network_Monitoring_Product_Code}) +" " + if(isblank({!Store_O365_Product_Code}), null, {!Store_O365_Product_Code})
